name: BagFace the demon
description:
The game is about a demonic child who will do anything to murder you while you try to uncover the mystery behind his death. Beware, for you will find a lot more than horror. 

   Shift ControlsWASDMove
ShiftDuckQClose pagesRight clickView pagesHHide in the hiding cabinet

When you find a cabinet, it is a hiding cabinet. It is rare. Press "H" to hide in there and "Q" to exit

Try to find all six pages, some are in the basement and some are on the second floor. If you see the screen display "He is near you" run to the nearest cabinet and hide!

The bug-fixed version will be released on Oct. 21st Friday!
